name: ScallySwag
description:
Lyrics:

Well here we are, we're back again at Semester Game Jam.
At the entrance we’d have by now, pizza with shrooms and ham.
Revealed will our theme at first, brainstormed right afterwards.
Until we build teams and plan to set new records.

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.

Oh here is our first merge conflict and another bluescreen.
Don’t worry we just began let’s start over clean.
Starting over, right now - wouldn’t be so wise
So let’s wait and participate at the midnight surprise

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.

The first are already awake, coding game mechanic
Why are the artists still asleep? I really start to panic.
The whole crew is now present, the first prototype exists.
Now let’s work until we’re done, no more sleep, I insist.

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.

Empty cans of energy are scattered here and there,
Supplies are already arranged, fatigue is everywhere.
We all clearly miss the good old days in garchingen-hochbruck,
Where the gamejam orga keeps us busy and for us will cook.

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.

Arise zombies, now finally the time has come,
Better get the last steps of your polish quickly done.
Even if you don’t get announced, start to see it grey,
The real price are the friends you made along the way.

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.

Let’s make some great games and play them once or twice,
Then rush the scores and plunder the epic coc~nut prize.
